verses.roman:
vāsudeva, murāri-gupta jagadānande pāñā
ānande rākhilā ghare, nā dena chāḍiyā

synonyms: vāsudeva—Vāsudeva; murāri-gupta—Murāri Gupta; jagadānande pāñā—getting Jagadānanda; ānande—in great happiness; rākhilā—kept; ghare—at home; nā dena chāḍiyā—did not allow to go out.
translation: Vāsudeva Datta and Murāri Gupta were so pleased to see Jagadānanda Paṇḍita that they kept him at their homes and would not allow him to leave.
